Salamtak Group Application provides high standard medical services in all medical specialties where everybody can have an instant access to online doctor appointments with reasonable prices, including in clinic reservation, home visits, online doctor consultation.

download-section.title: Download Salamtak app now.
download-section.co: Book a clinic appointment with only a click on your mobile.Discover comprehensive and diverse medical information and explore a variety of medical offers tailored to meet your expectations.

news.title: Why us?
news.first-title: All your medical needs in one app.
news.first-des: Salamtak unifies your healthcare needs and book clinic visits, home consultations, or online appointments with ease.
news.second-des: Book an in-clinic appointment or medical consultation through telehealth services easily and fastest with the Salamtak app.
news.third-des: Get top medical services and trusted consultations from Salamtak-certified doctors.
news.four-des: Book now a doctor appointment for free with Salamtak app anytime and anywhere.

title.label: Salamtak – Your Health, Our Aim
title.description: Salamtak is your medical companion, connecting you with top doctors and healthcare services effortlessly. Save time, effort, and money—all with just one tap!

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.description: Everyone deserves quality healthcare. At Salamtak, we bring medical services closer to you through:

mission-services.name: Clinic Appointments
mission-services.role: with top doctors in all specialties.

mission-services.name: A Smooth Experience
mission-services.role: via an advanced and user-friendly app.

mission-services.name: 24/7 Customer Support
mission-services.role: to ensure the best service experience.

salamtak.description: Because your health matters, Salamtak is always by your side.

vision.label: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the first choice for healthcare in Egypt, bridging the gap between patients and providers while delivering high-quality medical services.

vision-services.name: Trusted Healthcare Network
vision-services.role: Building a strong connection between patients and trusted healthcare providers.

vision-services.name: Seamless Access to Care
vision-services.role: Making healthcare accessible anytime, anywhere for everyone.

vision-services.name: Excellence in Medical Services
vision-services.role: Delivering top-quality, reliable, and patient-centered healthcare.

salamtak-services.name: سلامتك: Connect
salamtak-services.role: Get answers to all your medical concerns through video or phone consultations with Salamtak expert doctors.

salamtak-services.name: سلامتك Angel
salamtak-services.role: Your guide for simple medical consultations and access to high-quality healthcare services.

salamtak-services.name: سلامتك Booking
salamtak-services.role: Instantly book a clinic appointment with Salamtak top doctors across all specialties and locations.

salamtak-services.name: سلامتك Support
salamtak-services.role: A dedicated team available 24/7 to enhance your experience with the Salamtak app.

salamtak-services.name: سلامتك Home Care
salamtak-services.role: Expert medical care at your doorstep. Whether through voice or video consultations, Salamtak Home Care connects you with specialists in physiotherapy, mental health, nutrition, and more. We also provide daily home care services, ensuring personalized support that meets your health needs with comfort and ease.

salamtak-services.name: سلامتك polyclinics
salamtak-services.role: Your one-stop destination for specialized care. Polyclinics offer a wide range of medical services within a single specialty, led by highly qualified doctors at all levels—from general practitioners to senior consultants—ensuring top-quality healthcare tailored to your needs.

salamtak-services.name: سلامتك Labs
salamtak-services.role: Precision matters. Our advanced laboratories and Radiology centers provide accurate diagnostic tests, giving your doctor the essential insights needed for a precise diagnosis and effective treatment plan.

salamtak-services.name: سلامتك Radiology
salamtak-services.role: Precision matters. Our advanced laboratories and Radiology centers provide accurate diagnostic tests, giving your doctor the essential insights needed for a precise diagnosis and effective treatment plan.

salamtak-services.name: سلامتك Home Visit
salamtak-services.role: brings medical care straight to your home! Through our app, you can book home visits in various specialties, ensuring expert healthcare is always within reach—whether at home or beyond the clinic.

second-feature.label: Comprehensive Medical Services
second-feature.description: (Clinic visits, home visits, video & phone consultations).

third-feature.label: Instant & Easy Booking with top specialists.
third-feature.description: Book appointments quickly with trusted doctors..

fourth-feature.label: High-quality care tailored to your needs.

fifth-feature.label: Nationwide Coverage
fifth-feature.description: Access healthcare services across multiple cities and regions.

contact-us.label: Contact Us
contact-us.description: We’re here to help anytime! Feel free to reach out for support or to share your suggestions.
